item.title: What to do when you've been doxxed: A Comprehensive Guide
item.category: "Cybersecurity" , "Privacy Protection" , "Online Safety" , "Digital Privacy" , "Data Security" , "Personal Information Protection" , "Cybercrime Prevention" , "Identity Theft" , "Online Harassment" , "Digital Self-Defense"
item.description: Discover the essential steps to take when you've been doxxed, including how to remove personal information, strengthen online security, report the incident, seek support, and explore legal recourse.
